tool_description: Get publicly accessible information from farfetch.com using our Scraper API. Get Information such as Search Results, Product Information and URL Extraction.
name: Farfetch
title: Farfetch

api_list.name: Search By URL
api_list.description:
Get Search Results from URL.
This endpoint is for when you need highly custom filters.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Search Results Page URL.
This endpoint is for when you need highly custom filters.

api_list.name: Extract URL
api_list.description: Extract Information from a Farfetch.com URL.

api_list.name: Get Product By URL
Search By Keyword
api_list.description: Get Search Results using Keyword and Filters.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Options:

- lowToHigh
- highToLow
- mostRecent
- ourPicks
- discount
